id-00002.name: Claws
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) kinetic damage.

borgullet.name: Bor Gullet
borgullet.languages: understands Galactic Basic but can't speak, telepathy 120 ft.

id-00001.name: Creature Sense
id-00001.desc: The bor gullet is aware of the presence of creatures within 1 mile of it that have an Intelligence score of 4 or higher. It knows the distance and direction to each such creature, as well as each such creature's intelligence score, but it can't sense anything else about it. Droids and creatures protected by a mind blank power or other similar power cannot be perceived in this manner.

id-00002.name: Fortified Mind
id-00002.desc: The bor gullet has advantage on saving throws against being charmed and frightened, and it can't be put to sleep.

id-00003.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
id-00003.desc: If the bor gullet fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

id-00004.name: Psychic Link
id-00004.desc: The bor gullet can establish a psychic link with any creature that it successfully grapples with its tentacles. Until the psychic link ends, the bor gullet can perceive everything the target senses. The target is aware that its mind is linked, and the bor gullet can terminate the link at any time (no action required). The target can use an action on its turn to attempt to break the psychic link, doing so with a successful DC 18 Intelligence saving throw. On a successful save, the target takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage. The psychic link also ends if the target and the bor gullet are more than 1 mile apart, with no consequences to the target. The bor gullet can form psychic links with up to ten creatures at a time.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The bor gullet makes three tentacle attacks.

id-00002.name: Tentacle
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) kinetic damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16) if it is Large or smaller. Until the grapple ends, the target takes 9 (1d8 + 5) psychic damage at the start of each of its turns, and bor gullet can't use this tentacle on another target. The bor gullet has six tentacles.

id-00003.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6)
id-00003.desc: The bor gullet emits psychic energy. Creatures of the bor gullet's choice within 60 feet of it must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence saving throw or take 32 (5d10 + 5) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

id-00004.name: Sense Thoughts
id-00004.desc: The bor gullet targets a creature with which it has a psychic link. The bor gullet gains insight into the target's emotional state and any thoughts that loom large in its mind (including worries, loves, and hates). The bor gullet can also make a Charisma (Deception) check with advantage to deceive the target's mind into thinking it believes one idea or feels a particular emotion. The target contests this attempt with a Wisdom (Insight) check. If the bor gullet succeeds, the mind believes the deception for 1 hour or until evidence of the lie is presented to the target.

id-00001.name: Options
id-00001.desc: The bor gullet can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. It can take only one legendary action at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The bor gullet regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

id-00002.name: Tentacle
id-00002.desc: The bor gullet makes a tentacle attack.

id-00003.name: Break Concentration
id-00003.desc: The bor gullet targets a creature within 120 feet of it with which it has a psychic link. The bor gullet breaks the creature's concentration on a power it is using. The creature also takes 1d4 psychic damage per level of the power.

id-00004.name: Psychic Pulse
id-00004.desc: The bor gullet targets a creature within 120 feet of it with which it has a psychic link. Enemies of the bor gullet within 10 feet of that creature take 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

id-00005.name: Sever Psychic Link
id-00005.desc: The bor gullet targets a creature within 120 feet of it with which it has a psychic link. The bor gullet ends the link, causing the creature to have disadvantage on all ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the end of the creature's next turn.

brainworm.name: Brain Worm
brainworm.damageresistances: Energy and Kinetic from unenhanced weapons
brainworm.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 12

id-00001.name: Detect Sentience
id-00001.desc: The brain worm can sense the presence and location of any creature within 300 feet of it that has an Intelligence of 3 or higher, regardless of interposing barriers, unless the creature is protected by a mind blank force power.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The brain worm makes one enter orifice attack and uses consume mind.

id-00002.name: Enter Orifice
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) kinetic damage.

id-00003.name: Consume Mind
id-00003.desc: The brain worm targets one creature it can see within 10 feet of it that has a brain. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Intelligence saving throw against this magic or take 11 (2d10) psychic damage. Also on a failure, roll 3d6. If the total equals or exceeds the target's Intelligence score, that score is reduced to 0. The target is stunned until it regains at least one point of Intelligence.

id-00004.name: Body Thief
id-00004.desc: The brain worm initiates an Intelligence contest with an incapacitated humanoid within 5 feet of it. If it wins the contest, the brain worm burrows into the target's brain and takes control of the target's body.\rWhile inside a creature, the brain worm has total cover against attacks and other effects originating outside its host. The brain worm retains its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as its understanding of Geonosian, its telepathy, and its traits. It otherwise adopts the target's statistics. It knows everything the creature knew, including force powers, tech powers, and languages.\rIf the host body takes 20 points of cold damage in a single round, the brain worm must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw using its own Constitution score, not the host's. On a failure, the brain worm leaves the body, slithering out to a space within 5 ft. of the host. After exiting the host, it is paralyzed until the start of its next turn.\rIf the host body dies, the brain worm must leave it. The brain worm is also forced out if the target regains its devoured brain by means of a master heal force power. By spending 5 feet of its movement, the brain worm can voluntarily leave the body, slithering out to the nearest unoccupied space within 5 feet of it.

cantinabrawl.name: Cantina Brawl
cantinabrawl.conditionimmunities: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned
cantinabrawl.languages: Galactic Basic and any one other language

id-00001.name: Liquid Courage (Recharge 5-6)
id-00001.desc: As a bonus action, the cantina brawl imbibes nearby alcohol to gain access to a hidden reservoir of audacity and grit. The cantina brawl gains 7 (2d6) temporary hp for 1 minute.

id-00002.name: Swarm
id-00002.desc: The cantina brawl can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the cantina brawl can move through any opening large enough for a medium humanoid. Except for Liquid COurage, the cantina brawl can't regain hp or gain temporary hp.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The cantina brawl makes two melee attacks or two darts attacks.

id-00002.name: Stool
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 0 ft., one target in the cantina brawl's space. Hit: 14 (4d4 + 4) kinetic damage, or 7 (2d4 + 2) if the cantina brawl has half its hit points or fewer.

id-00003.name: Broken Bottles
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 0 ft., one target in the cantina brawl's space. Hit: 17 (6d4 + 2) kinetic damage, or 8 (3d4 + 1) if the cantina brawl has half its hit points or fewer.

id-00004.name: Darts
id-00004.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 20/40 ft., Hit.\r10 (4d4) kinetic damage, or 5 (2d4) if the cantina brawl has half its hit points or fewer.

id-00003.name: Claws

darksidespirit.conditionimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
darksidespirit.languages: The languages it knew in life

id-00001.name: Incorporeal Movement
id-00001.desc: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

id-00001.name: Maddening Touch
id-00001.desc: Melee Power Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (4d6+3) psychic damage.

id-00002.name: Whispers of Madness
id-00002.desc: The spirit chooses up to three creatures it can see within 60 ft. of it. Each target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw, or it takes 7 (1d8 + 3) psychic damage and must use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack against one creature of the spirit's choice that the spirit can see.

id-00003.name: Howling Babble (Recharge 6)
id-00003.desc: Each creature within 30 ft. of the spirit that can hear it must make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 12 (2d8 + 3) psychic damage, and it is stunned until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

deathtrooper.name: Death Trooper
deathtrooper.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 60 ft., truesight 15 ft., passive Perception 17
deathtrooper.languages: Galactic Basic, one other of your choice

id-00001.name: Skirmish
id-00001.desc: The trooper can use Disengage as a bonus action.

id-00002.name: Precise Shot (3/Day)
id-00002.desc: As a bonus action before making a ranged weapon attack, the trooper can take aim at a vital point of a target causing an extra 7 (2d6) energy damage on a hit.

id-00003.name: Enhanced Sensors
id-00003.desc: The trooper has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

id-00004.name: Enhanced Weapons
id-00004.desc: The troopers weapon attacks are enhanced.

id-00005.name: Stealthy
id-00005.desc: The trooper can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

id-00006.name: Surprise Attack
id-00006.desc: If the trooper surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage from the attack.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The trooper makes two melee attacks or four ranged attacks.

id-00002.name: Techblade
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 +4) kinetic damage.

id-00003.name: Blaster Rifle
id-00003.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) energy damage.

id-00004.name: Volley (Recharge 5-6)
id-00004.desc: The trooper shoots a rain of deadly blaster bolts in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d8 + 4) energy damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

id-00001.name: Keen Smell
id-00001.desc: The dewback has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The dewback makes two attacks. one with its bite and one with its claws.

id-00002.name: Bite
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8+4) kinetic damage.

id-00003.name: Claw
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6+4) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Keen Smell
id-00001.desc: The dewback has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The dewback makes two attacks. one with its bite and one with its claws.

id-00002.name: Bite
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8+5) kinetic damage.

id-00003.name: Claw
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6+5) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Limited Amphibiousness
id-00001.desc: The dianoga can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The dianoga can make two attacks. one with its tentacles and one with its bite.

id-00002.name: Tentacles
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) kinetic damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained.

id-00003.name: Bite
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) kinetic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. Until the poison ends, the target is paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the poison on itself on a success.

id-00001.name: Grasping Tendrils
id-00001.desc: The dianoga can have up to seven at a time. Each tentacle can be attacked (AC 20; 10 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage).\rDestroying a tentacle deals no damage to the dianoga, which can extrude a replacement tentacle on its next turn. A tentacle can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a DC 16 Strength check against it.

id-00002.name: Limited Amphibiousness
id-00002.desc: The dianoga can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The dianoga can make three attacks. two with its tentacles and one with its bite.

id-00002.name: Bite
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) kinetic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw against disease or become poisoned until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the target must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 (1d10) on a failure. The disease is cured on a success. The target dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the disease is cured.

id-00003.name: Tentacles
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) kinetic damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained.

id-00004.name: Tentacle Slam
id-00004.desc: The dianoga slams creatures grappled by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (2d6 + 3) kinetic damage and be stunned until the end of the dianoga's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the kinetic damage and isn't stunned.

id-00001.name: Hold Breath
id-00001.desc: The dragonsnake can hold its breath for 1 hour.

id-00002.name: Surprise Attack
id-00002.desc: If the dragonsnake surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage from the attack.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The dragonsnake can make three attacks. two with its claws and one with its bite.

id-00002.name: Bite
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) kinetic damage.

id-00003.name: Claws
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Circuitry
id-00001.desc: The bomber has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

id-00002.name: Siege Monster
id-00002.desc: The bomber deals double damage to objects and structures.

id-00001.name: Deflector Shield
id-00001.desc: The bomber adds 3 to its AC against one attack that would hit it. To do so, the bomber must see the attacker.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The bomber makes two light laser cannon attacks or two slam attacks.

id-00002.name: Slam
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8+4) kinetic damage.

id-00003.name: Light Laser Cannons
id-00003.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, range 100/200, one target. Hit: 42 (5d12+10) energy damage.

id-00004.name: Concussion Missile (4/maintenance)
id-00004.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack.\r+2 to hit, range 100/200, one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) kinetic damage. Hit or miss, the target and each creature within 15 feet must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 10), taking 16 (3d10) energy damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

id-00005.name: Proton Torpedo (4/maintenance)
id-00005.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 300/600, one target. Hit: 11 (2d10) kinetic damage. Hit or miss, the target and each creature within 15 feet must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 10), taking 11 (2d10) energy damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

id-00001.name: Circuitry
id-00001.desc: The starfighter has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

id-00002.name: Fragile Flyer
id-00002.desc: The startfighter cannot enter flight mode if it has fewer than 70 hit points.

id-00003.name: Mag-lock Limbs
id-00003.desc: The starfighter can climb metal surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

id-00004.name: Cis Variant
id-00004.desc: The standard statblock assumes a Trade Federation\rdroid. After the clone wars began in earnest, the CIS\rvariant came into use. To use this variant, simply swap\rout the vulture droid's proton torpedo attack for the\rconcussion missle attack below.

id-00001.name: Deflector Shield
id-00001.desc: The starfighter adds 3 to its AC against one attack that would hit it. To do so, the starfighter must see the attacker.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The starfighter makes two slam attacks.

id-00002.name: Slam
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6+3) kinetic damage.

id-00003.name: Proton Torpedo (2/maintenance)
id-00003.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 300/600, one target. Hit: 9 (2d8) kinetic damage. Hit or miss, the target and each creature within 15 feet must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 11), taking 9 (2d8) energy damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

id-00004.name: Concussion Missile (2/Maintenance)
id-00004.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 100/200 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d8) kinetic damage.Hit or miss, the target and each creature within 15 feet must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 11), taking 13 (3d8) energy damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.(CIS Variant only)

id-00001.name: Circuitry
id-00001.desc: The droid tank has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The droid tank makes two medium laser cannon attacks.

id-00002.name: Crushing Stride
id-00002.desc: The droid tank moves up to its speed in a straight line. During this move, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. A creature whose space the droid tank enters must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is pushed 5 feet to the nearest space out of the droid tank's path .\rOn a failed save, the creature falls prone and takes 28 (8d6) bludgeoning damage. If the droid tank remains in the prone creature's space, the creature is also restrained until it's no longer in the same space as the droid tank. While restrained in this way, the creature, or another creature within 5 feet of it, can make a DC 18 Strength check. On a success, the creature is shunted to an unoccupied space of its choice within 5 feet of the droid tank and is no longer restrained.

id-00003.name: Med Laser Cannon
id-00003.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +9 to hit, 100/400, one target. Hit 20 (3d10 + 4) energy damage.

id-00004.name: Missile Launchers (10/Day)
id-00004.desc: The droid tank launches three missiles at points within 240 feet of it that it can see.\rEach creature within a 10-foot radius sphere of each point must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) fire and 21 (6d6) kinetic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature in the area of more than one sphere is affected only once. Large and larger constructs and structures have disadvantage on the saving throw, and suffer an additional 21 (6d6) fire and 21 (6d6) kinetic damage if they fail the save by 10 or more.

energyspider.name: Energy Spider
energyspider.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 13

id-00001.name: Energy Absorption
id-00001.desc: Whenever the spider is subjected to energy damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the energy damage dealt.

id-00002.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
id-00002.desc: While in sunlight, the spider has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

id-00003.name: Spider Climb
id-00003.desc: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

id-00004.name: Web Sense
id-00004.desc: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

id-00005.name: Web Walker
id-00005.desc: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

id-00001.name: Bite
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) kinetic damage.

id-00002.name: Web (Recharge 5-6)
id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. Hit: The target is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained target can make a DC 12 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

exogorth_adolescent.name: Exogorth, Adolescent
exogorth_adolescent.damageresistances: acid, poison (interior); energy, ion, kinetic from nonmagical weapons (exterior)
exogorth_adolescent.senses: blindsight 30 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 10

id-00001.name: Tunneler
id-00001.desc: The exogorth can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

id-00002.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
id-00002.desc: If the exogorth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

id-00003.name: Huge Strength
id-00003.desc: The exogorth's melee weapon attacks are considered enhanced.

id-00004.name: Siege Monster
id-00004.desc: The exogorth deals double damage to objects and structures.

id-00005.name: Space-borne
id-00005.desc: The exogorth can survive in the vacuum of space.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The exogorth makes two attacks. one with its bite and one with its tail.

id-00002.name: Bite
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) kinetic damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the exogorth.\rA swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the exogorth, and it takes 14 (4d6) acid damage at the start of each of the exogorth's turns.\rIf the exogorth takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the exogorth must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the exogorth. If the exogorth dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

id-00003.name: Tail
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) kinetic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone

exogorth_adult.name: Exogorth, Adult
exogorth_adult.damageresistances: acid, poison (interior); energy, ion, kinetic from nonmagical weapons (exterior)
exogorth_adult.senses: blindsight 30 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 10

id-00002.desc: If the exogorth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

If the exogorth dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

id-00003.name: Tail

id-00001.desc: The fambaa can breathe air and water.

id-00002.desc: The fambaa deals double damage to objects and structures.

id-00001.name: Amphibious
id-00001.desc: The fambaa can breathe air and water.

id-00002.name: Howdah
id-00002.desc: The fambaa carries a fortified platform on its back. Up to six Medium creatures can ride on the platform without squeezing. Creatures on the platform have three-quarters cover against attacks and effects from outside it. If the fambaa dies, creatures on the platform are placed in occupied spaces within 10 feet of the fambaa.

id-00003.name: Siege Monster
id-00003.desc: The fambaa deals double damage to objects and structures.

id-00001.name: Bite
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (3d6 + 6) kinetic damage.

id-00002.name: Stomp
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (4d8 + 6) kinetic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

id-00001.name: Diving Ambush
id-00001.desc: If the skullborer drops on to target from above and hits it with a bite attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) kinetic damage per 10 feet fallen, up to 14 (4d6). If the skullborer misses, it takes half normal falling damage for distance fallen.

id-00002.name: Poisonous Skin
id-00002.desc: Any creature that grapples the skullborer or otherwise comes into direct contact with the skullborer's skin must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute.\rThe target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

id-00003.name: Superior Camouflage
id-00003.desc: The skullborer can turn invisible as an action or bonus action.

id-00001.name: Bite
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) kinetic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 14) and must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.

id-00002.name: Extract Brain
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated humanoid grappled by the skullborer. Hit: The target takes 36 (8d8) kinetic damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the skullborer kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

id-00001.name: Strike
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Reckless
id-00001.desc: At the start of its turn, the berserker can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

id-00001.name: Vibroaxe
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d12+3) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Martial Advantage
id-00001.desc: Once per turn, the captain can deal an extra 14 (4d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the captain that isn't incapacitated.

id-00001.name: Parry
id-00001.desc: The captain adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the captain must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The mercenary makes three weapon attacks.

id-00002.name: Hold-out
id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) energy damage.

id-00003.name: Techblade
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) kinetic damage.

id-00004.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
id-00004.desc: For 1 minute, the captain can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the captain. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the captain is incapacitated.

id-00001.name: Circuitry
id-00001.desc: The droid has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

id-00002.name: Interfaced Tracking Protocol
id-00002.desc: While a creature is interfaced with this droid via the tracker droid interface tech power, when it makes a Wisdom (Survival) check to track a target, and this droid is also tracking that target, the interfaced creature gains advantage on the check. If it already has advantage, it can instead reroll one of the dice once.

id-00001.name: Shockprod
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 lightning damage.

id-00001.name: Circuitry
id-00001.desc: The droid has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

id-00002.name: Safety Restraints
id-00002.desc: The droid deals only non-lethal damage.

id-00003.name: Interfaced Distraction Protocol
id-00003.desc: While you are interfaced with this droid via the tracker droid interface tech power, when your droid is within 5 feet of a target, you do not provoke opportunity attacks when moving out of that creature's reach.

id-00001.name: Stunner
id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 10/30 ft., one target. Hit: 1 energy damage.

id-00001.name: Brave
id-00001.desc: The gladiator has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

id-00002.name: Brute
id-00002.desc: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the gladiator hits with it (included in the attack).

id-00001.name: Parry
id-00001.desc: The gladiator adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the gladiator must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The gladiator makes two vibroblade attacks and one shield bash.

id-00002.name: Vibroblade
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8+4) kinetic damage.

id-00003.name: Shield Bash
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4+4) kinetic damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

id-00001.name: Circuitry
id-00001.desc: The construct has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

id-00002.name: Targeting Systems
id-00002.desc: The turret uses its Intelligence modifier for attack, damage, and intitiative rolls.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The turret makes two repeating blaster attacks.

id-00002.name: Repeating Blaster
id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 40/160 ft., one target. Hit 5 (1d6+2) energy damage.

id-00001.name: Circuitry
id-00001.desc: The construct has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

id-00002.name: False Appearance
id-00002.desc: While the turret is inactive, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary section of floor, wall, or ceiling.

id-00003.name: Targeting Systems
id-00003.desc: The turret uses its Intelligence modifier for attack, damage, and initiative rolls.\rIntelligence (Investigation) and Wisdom (Perception) checks made to identify an inactive turret are made with disadvantage.

id-00001.name: Blaster Cannon
id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit 7 (1d10+2) energy damage.

id-00001.name: Sure-footed
id-00001.desc: The kaadu has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

id-00001.name: Hooves
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Pack Tactics
id-00001.desc: The monkey-lizard has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the monkeylizard's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

id-00001.name: Bite
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 (1d4-1) kinetic damage.

monkey_lizardswarm.name: Monkey-lizard Swarm
monkey_lizardswarm.conditionimmunities: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

id-00001.name: Pack Tactics
id-00001.desc: The swarm has advantage on attack rolls against a creature while at more than half of its hit points.

id-00002.name: Swarm
id-00002.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny porg. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

id-00001.name: Bite

id-00001.name: Atmosphere Agnostic
id-00001.desc: The mynock can survive in any type of atmosphere or vacuum.

id-00002.name: Battery Drainer
id-00002.desc: If the mynock attaches itself to a piece of equipment that needs energy to function, that piece will stop working until the Mynock is removed.

id-00003.name: Pack Tactics
id-00003.desc: The mynock has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one ally of the mynock is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

id-00001.name: Energy Drain
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) kinetic damage, and the mynock attaches to the target. If attached to a droid or construct, at the start of each of the mynock's turns, the target loses 5 (1d4 + 3) hit points due to energy being drained.\rThe mynock can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its Movement. It does so after it drains 10 Hit Points of energy from the target or the target dies. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the Mynock.

id-00001.name: Detect Dark Side
id-00001.desc: The orbalisk can sense the presence and location of any dark side aligned creature within 300 feet.

id-00001.name: Attach
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) kinetic damage, and the orbalisk attaches to the target. Once attached to a target, the orbalisk begins to reproduce through fragmentation. Whenever the host completes a long rest, they must make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw.\rFor each saving throw the host fails, the size of their Hit Dice is reduced. from d12 to d10, from d10 to d8, from d8 to d6, from d6 to d4, or from d4 to d2. If the host fails a saving throw while their Hit Die is a d2, they die as the orbalisks consume them.

id-00002.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
id-00002.desc: If the Rancor fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The Rancor can use its Frightful Roar. It then makes three attacks. two with its claws, and one with its bite. It can use its swallow instead of its bite.

id-00002.name: Claw
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit 20 (3d8 + 7) Kinetic damage.

id-00004.name: Throw Boulder

id-00005.name: Frightful Roar
id-00005.desc: Each creature of the rancor's choice within 90 feet of it must succeed a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the Rancor is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the rancor's Frightful Roar for the next 24 hours.

id-00006.name: Swallow
id-00006.desc: The Rancor makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target takes the bite's damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the Rancor, and it takes 35 (10d6) acid damage at the start of each of the Rancor's turns.\rIf the Rancor takes 35 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the Rancor must suceed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the Rancor. If the Rancor dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 10 feet of movement, exiting prone.

id-00001.name: Options
id-00001.desc: The rancor can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Rancor regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

id-00003.name: Battle Cry (1/Day)
id-00003.desc: Each creature of the chieftain's choice that is within 30 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by Battle Cry gain advantage on attack rolls until the start of the chieftain's next turn. The chieftain can then make one attack as a bonus action.

id-00001.name: Brave
id-00001.desc: The captain has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

id-00001.name: Leadership (Recharges after Short or Long Rest)
id-00001.desc: The Trooper Captain can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the Trooper Captain. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The captain makes two blaster rifle attacks and throws a fragmentation grenade, if available.

id-00002.name: Blaster Rifle
id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8+4) energy damage.

id-00003.name: Frag Grenade (3/Day)
id-00003.desc: The captain throws a grenade, choosing a point within 40 ft. Each creature within 10 feet must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 2d6 kinetic damage on a failed save, or half as much as on a successful one.

id-00004.name: Stock Strike
id-00004.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Blaster Rifle
id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) energy damage.

id-00002.name: Stock Strike
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) kinetic damage.

troopersquad.name: Trooper Squad
troopersquad.conditionimmunities: charmed, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

id-00001.name: Squad
id-00001.desc: The squad can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and can move through openings large enough for a Medium humanoid. The squad is immune to any power or effect that would alter its form.

id-00002.name: Reactive
id-00002.desc: The squad can take one reaction each turn.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The squad makes four blaster rifle attacks, or two blaster rifle attacks if it has half its hit points or fewer.

id-00002.name: Blaster Rifle
id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) energy damage.

id-00003.name: Massed Fire
id-00003.desc: The squad fires en masse at a point within 150 ft. Each creature of the squad's choice in a 10-footradius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 36 (8d8) piercing damage, or 18 (4d8) piercing damage if the squad has half its hit points or fewer. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage.

id-00001.name: Keen Hearing And Sight
id-00001.desc: The scout trooper has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The scout trooper makes two weapon attacks.

id-00002.name: Hold-out Blaster
id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) energy damage.

id-00003.name: Vibrodagger
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Flamethrower
id-00001.desc: Each creature in a 30-foot cone must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 13 (3d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

id-00002.name: Blaster Pistol
id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 40/160 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) energy damage.

id-00003.name: Bash
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Fragmentation Grenade (3/day)
id-00001.desc: The trooper throws a grenade, choosing a point within 35 ft. Each creature within 10 feet must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 2d6 kinetic damage on a failed save, or half as much as on a successful one.

id-00002.name: Set Mine (2/day)
id-00002.desc: After setting this mine, a laser line imperceptible to normal vision extends up to 15 feet out. When the laser is tripped, the mine explodes, and each creature within 15 feet of it must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 3d6 kinetic damage, or half as much on a successful one.

id-00003.name: Breaching Charge (2/day)
id-00003.desc: After spending at least 30 seconds setting the charge, the trooper may attach the charge to a surface. The charge can be set with a 6-second timer, or detonated remotely using a remote detonator, which the trooper has. Once detonated, the breaching charge destroys an unenhanced section of wall up to 10 feet wide, 10 feet tall, and 5 feet deep. Additionally, each creature within 20 feet of the charge must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 fire damage and 3d6 kinetic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. A construct makes this save with disadvantage. If the breaching charge is installed on the construct, it automatically fails the saving throw.

id-00004.name: Blaster Pistol
id-00004.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 40/160 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) energy damage.

id-00001.name: Assault Cannon
id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10+3) energy damage.

id-00002.name: Burst
id-00002.desc: The trooper sprays a 10-foot-cube area within normal range with shots. Each creature in the area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 8 (1d10+3) energy damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

id-00003.name: Bash
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Cunning Action
id-00001.desc: On each of its turns, the trooper can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

id-00002.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
id-00002.desc: The trooper deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 ft. of an ally of the trooper that isn't incapacitated and the trooper doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

id-00001.name: Sniper Rifle
id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d12+3) energy damage.

id-00002.name: Vibrodagger
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4+3) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Jetpack
id-00001.desc: Activating or deactivating the jetpack requires a bonus action and, while active, the trooper has a flying speed of 30 feet. The jetpack lasts for a maximum of 10 minutes.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The trooper makes two attacks, one with its blaster pistol and one with its wrist launcher.

id-00002.name: Blaster Pistol
id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 40/160 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) energy damage.

id-00003.name: Wrist Launcher
id-00003.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target.* Hit:* 6 (1d6+3) kinetic damage, and each creature within 5 feet must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 3 (1d6) kinetic damage on a failed save, or half on a successful save.

armoredassaulttank_aat_.name: Armored Assault Tank (AAT)
armoredassaulttank_aat_.conditionimmunities: blinded, charmed, frightened, incapacitated, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned,

id-00001.name: Circuitry
id-00001.desc: The construct has disadvantage on saving\rthrows against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

id-00002.name: Freedom Of Movement
id-00002.desc: The AAT ignores difficult terrain and can pass through occupied hostile spaces.

id-00003.name: Vulnerable Interior
id-00003.desc: The AAT's interior is vulnerable to damage done by grenades, mines and charges, unless it is immune to that damage. It also automatically fails all Dexterity saving throws from such effects that occur in its interior.

id-00004.name: Gunner
id-00004.desc: The construct requires an active gunner to operate the vehicles weaponry. Gunner controls Plasma Cannon and Medium Repeating Blasters.

id-00005.name: Operated
id-00005.desc: Operated by a Pilot and Gunner roll a separate initiative for both.

id-00006.name: Piloted
id-00006.desc: The construct requires an active pilot to take any actions, and if the pilot is subjected to any conditions that the construct is not immune to, the construct is also subjected to those conditions. Pilot Controls movement, Ram action, and Rocket launchers.

id-00001.name: Pilot
id-00001.desc: Pilot of the AAT can use the Ram action and make one attack utilizing the Rocket Launcher.

id-00002.name: Gunner
id-00002.desc: Gunner can make two attacks using the medium repeating blasters.

id-00003.name: Ram
id-00003.desc: Any creature within the AAT's movement path must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 26 (4d12) kinetic damage on a failed save and is knocked prone, or half as much damage on a successful one.

id-00004.name: Rocket Launchers (6/Day Reload 1 Turn)
id-00004.desc: Ranged weapon range 100/400 DC 14 launches a barrage of rockets at a target and any creature within 10ft. Taking 6d6 kinetic damage on a failed save and half as much on a successful one.

id-00005.name: Med Repeating Blasters
id-00005.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 120/240 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (4d10+6) energy damage.

id-00006.name: Plasma Cannon (Recharge 5-6)
id-00006.desc: The AAT launches a plasma shell 150/300 ft range target must be at least 15 ft away from the AAT. Blast has a 15ft Radius. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 52 (8d12) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. (If shot is over 150ft targets have advantage on dex save).

id-00001.name: Beak
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) kinetic damage.

id-00002.name: Talons
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Assassinate
id-00001.desc: During its first turn, the assassin has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the assassin scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

id-00002.name: Evasion
id-00002.desc: If the assassin is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the assassin instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

id-00003.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
id-00003.desc: The assassin deals an extra 13 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the assassin that isn't incapacitated and the assassin doesn't have disadvantage on the roll.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The assassin makes two weapon attacks.

id-00002.name: Hidden blade
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+3) kinetic damage.

id-00003.name: Hold-out
id-00003.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4+3) energy damage.

id-00001.name: Charge
id-00001.desc: If the boar-wolf moves at least 20 ft. toward a target and hits it with a tusk attack on that turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) kinetic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

id-00002.name: Keen Ears And Nose
id-00002.desc: The beast has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

id-00003.name: Relentless (Recharges After A Short Or Long Rest)
id-00003.desc: If the boarwolf takes 10 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

id-00001.name: Tusk
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Standing Leap
id-00001.desc: The clodhopper's long jump is up to 20 ft.\rand its high jump is up to 10 ft., with or without a running start.

id-00001.name: Beak
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Tactical Technology
id-00001.desc: When the engineer casts a tech power that causes damage or that forces other creatures to make a saving throw, it can choose itself and any number of allies to be immune to the damage caused by the power and to succeed on the required saving throw.

id-00002.name: Technological Advantage
id-00002.desc: Once per turn, the engineer can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a damaging tech attack if that target is within 5 feet of an ally of the engineer and that ally isn't incapacitated.

id-00003.name: Spellcasting
id-00003.desc: The combat engineer is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The engineer has 31 tech points. The combat engineer has the following spells prepared:\rCantrips (At will): acid splash, jet of flame, cryogenic burst, electroshock\r1st level (31 slots): smoke cloud, homing rockets, overload\r2nd level (31 slots): magnetic field, acid dart, shocking ray\r3rd level (31 slots): explosion, tactical advantage, kolto cloud\r4th level (31 slots): cryogenic storm

id-00001.name: Vibrostaff
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) kinetic damage if used with two hands.

id-00002.name: Light Pistol
id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 40/160 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+1) energy damage.

id-00001.name: Spellcasting
id-00001.desc: The combat engineer is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The engineer has 14 tech points. The combat engineer has the following spells prepared:\rCantrips (At will): electroshock, encrypted message, rime shot\r1st level (14 slots): energy shield, homing rockets, repair droid, smoke cloud\r2nd level (14 slots): acid dart, magnetic field

id-00001.name: Blaster Carbine
id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) energy damage.

id-00001.name: Bite
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Hooves
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Keen Hearing
id-00001.desc: The fathier has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

id-00002.name: Trampling Charge
id-00002.desc: If the fathier moves at least 20 ft.\rstraight toward a creature and then hits it with a hooves attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the fathier can make another attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

id-00001.name: Hooves
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Keen Sight And Smell
id-00001.desc: The flutterplume has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

id-00002.name: Pack Tactics
id-00002.desc: The flutterplume has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

id-00001.name: Beak
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: (1d4) piercing damage

forcestormeye.name: Force Storm Eye
forcestormeye.damageresistances: energy, ion, and kinetic from unenhanced weapons
forcestormeye.conditionimmunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned

id-00001.name: Air Form
id-00001.desc: The eye can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

id-00002.name: Flyby
id-00002.desc: The eye doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

id-00003.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
id-00003.desc: If the eye fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

id-00004.name: Siege Conditions
id-00004.desc: The eye deals double damage to objects and structures.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The eye attacks twice with thunder slam.

id-00002.name: Thunder Slam
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (4d6+9) sonic damage.

id-00003.name: Lightning Storm (Recharge 6)
id-00003.desc: All other creatures within 120 ft. of the eye must each make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If a target's saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is also stunned until the end of its next turn.

id-00001.name: Options
id-00001.desc: The eye can take 3 legendary actions. Choosing from the options below, one option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The eye regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

id-00002.name: Move
id-00002.desc: The eye moves up to its speed.

id-00003.name: Lightning Strike (Costs 2 Actions)
id-00003.desc: The eye can cause a bolt of lightning to strike a point anywhere under its storm.\rEach creature within 5 feet of that point must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much sonic damage on a successful one.

id-00004.name: Screaming Gale (Costs 3 Actions)
id-00004.desc: The eye releases a blast of thunder and wind in a line that is 1 mile long and 20 feet wide. Objects in that area take 22 (4d10) sonic damage. Each creature there must succeed on a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw or take 22 (4d10) sonic damage and be flung up to 60 ft. in a direction away from the line. If a thown target collides with immovable object, such as a wall or floor, the target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 ft. it was thrown before impact. If the target would collide with another creature instead, that other creature must succeed on a DC19 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone.

id-00001.name: Reckless
id-00001.desc: At the start of its turn, the fyrnock can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

id-00002.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
id-00002.desc: The fyrnock takes 5 fire damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The fyrnock makes two claw attacks.

id-00002.name: Claw
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) kinetic damage.

gamorreanguard.name: Gamorrean Guard
gamorreanguard.damageresistances: Kinetic and Energy from unenhanced weapons

id-00001.name: Traits Reckless
id-00001.desc: At the start of its turn, the berserker can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

id-00002.name: Brutal Critical
id-00002.desc: When the guards scores a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

id-00001.name: Vibroaxe
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 12 (1d12 + 6)

id-00001.name: Mimicry
id-00001.desc: The geejaw can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.

id-00001.name: Beak
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Ambusher
id-00001.desc: In the first round of a combat, the ghest has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

id-00002.name: Hold Breath
id-00002.desc: The ghest can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The ghest can make two attacks. one with its bite and one with its claws.

id-00002.name: Bite
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) kinetic damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the ghest can't bite another target.

id-00003.name: Claws
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) kinetic damage.

id-00004.name: Swallow
id-00004.desc: The ghest makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the ghest, and it takes 10 (3d6) acid damage at the start of each of the ghest's turns. The ghest can have only one target swallowed at a time.\rIf the ghest takes 25 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the ghest must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the ghest. If the ghest dies, the swallowed creatures are no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

gizka.name: Gizka
gizka.senses: blindsight 120 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10

id-00001.name: Echolocation
id-00001.desc: The gizka can't use its blindsight while deafened.

id-00002.name: Standing Leap
id-00002.desc: The gizka's long jump is up to 10 ft. and its high jump is up to 5 ft., with or without a running start.

id-00001.name: Bite
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 kinetic damage.

gizkaswarm.name: Gizka Swarm
gizkaswarm.conditionimmunities: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned
gizkaswarm.senses: blindsight 120 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 12

id-00001.name: Bite
id-00001.desc: Languages

id-00002.name: Swarm
id-00002.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny gizka. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

id-00003.name: Echolocation
id-00003.desc: The swarm can't use its blindsight while deafened.

id-00001.name: Bite
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 7 (2d6) kinetic damage or 3 (1d6) kinetic damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

id-00001.name: Explosive Destruction
id-00001.desc: When the Gonk droid is reduced to zero hit points, it explodes. Each creature within 20 feet of it must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 6d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

id-00001.name: Kick
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 2 (1d4 + 0)

id-00001.name: Explosive Destruction
id-00001.desc: When the Gonk droid is reduced to zero hit points, it explodes. Each creature within 20 feet of it must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 6d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

id-00001.name: Kick
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 2 (1d4 + 0).

id-00002.name: Blaster Rifle
id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) energy damage.

id-00001.name: Keen Hearing
id-00001.desc: The gorax has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

id-00002.name: Stench
id-00002.desc: Any creature other than a gorax that starts its turn within 10 feet of the gorax must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of any gorax for 1 hour.

id-00003.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
id-00003.desc: While in sunlight, the gorax has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The gorax makes two greatclub attacks.

id-00002.name: Stomp
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. Hit: 27 (6d6 + 5) kinetic damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 15).\rUntil this grapple ends, the target is prone. The grapple ends early if the gorax moves.

id-00003.name: Greatclub
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) kinetic damage.

id-00004.name: Rock
id-00004.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) kinetic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

id-00001.name: Keen Sight And Smell
id-00001.desc: The greysor has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight and smell.

id-00002.name: Pack Tactics
id-00002.desc: The greysor has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the greysor's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

id-00001.name: Bite
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Keen Smell
id-00001.desc: The hive rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

id-00002.name: Pack Tactics
id-00002.desc: The hive rat has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hive rat's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

id-00001.name: Bite
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) kinetic damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15).

id-00001.name: Rampage
id-00001.desc: When the gundark reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gundark can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a claw attack.

id-00002.name: Keen Hearing And Smell
id-00002.desc: The gundark has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The gundark can make four attacks. two with its claws and two with its gigantic claws.

id-00002.name: Claw
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 +3) kinetic damage.

id-00003.name: Gigantic Claw
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 +3) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Rampage
id-00001.desc: When the gundark reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gundark can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a claw attack.

id-00002.name: Keen Hearing And Smell
id-00002.desc: The gundark has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The gundark can make two claw attacks.

id-00002.name: Claw
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 +3) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Aura Of Blood Thirst
id-00001.desc: If the matriarch isn't incapacitated, any other gundark can make a melee attack as a bonus action while within 10 feet of the matriarch.

id-00002.name: Rampage
id-00002.desc: When the matriarch reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the matriarch can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a claw attack.

id-00003.name: Keen Hearing And Smell
id-00003.desc: The matriarch has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The matriarch can make four attacks. two with its claws and two with its gigantic claws.

id-00002.name: Claw
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) kinetic damage.

id-00003.name: Gigantic Claw
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Siege Monster
id-00001.desc: The gundark deals double damage to objects and structures.

id-00002.name: Keen Sight And Smell
id-00002.desc: The gundark has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The gundark makes two attacks with its claws.\rIt then makes one bite attack or one pummel attack.

id-00002.name: Claw
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5ft, one target, hit 12 (2d6+5) kinetic damage. The target is grappled (escape DC 15) if that claw isn't already grappling a creature. Until the grapple ends, the creature is restrained.

id-00003.name: Bite
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5ft, one target, hit 9 (1d8+5) kinetic damage.

id-00004.name: Pummel
id-00004.desc: The monster makes one claw attack against a creature it is grappling. The the attack hits, the monster takes the claw's damage.

at_at.name: AT-AT
at_at.conditionimmunities: blinded, charmed, frightened, incapacitated, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned, diseased

id-00001.name: Circuitry
id-00001.desc: The construct has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

id-00002.name: Heavy Durasteel Armor
id-00002.desc: The outer layer of the AT-AT is covered in heavy armor, making it difficult for smaller arms to damage it. Unless the damage from a single attack or effect exceeds 30 points, the AT-AT takes no damage from that attack. If the AT-AT takes an amount of damage from a single attack or effect equal to or greater than its damage threshold, it takes damage as normal.

id-00003.name: Piloted
id-00003.desc: The construct requires an active pilot to take any actions, and if the pilot is subjected to any conditions that the construct is not immune to, the construct is also subjected to those conditions. The pilot may take their own action or one of the actions granted by the construct.

id-00004.name: Towering
id-00004.desc: Creatures of Large size or smaller can stand in the AT-AT's space.

id-00005.name: Troop Transport
id-00005.desc: The AT-AT can transport a maximum of 40 stormtroopers and five speeder bikes, which it can deploy using its Deploy Troops legendary action, or which can be fought by creatures inside of the AT-AT.

id-00006.name: Vulnerable Interior
id-00006.desc: The AT-AT's interior is vulnerable to damage done by grenades, mines and charges, unless it is immune to that damage. It also automatically fails all Dexterity saving throws from such effects that occur in its interior.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The AT-AT can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks. one with its laser cannon volley and two with its medium repeaters.

id-00002.name: Laser Cannon Volley
id-00002.desc: The AT-AT chooses a point within 320 ft and lets loose a blast from each of its heavy laser cannons that explodes in a 15ft cube around that point. Each creature within the cube must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) energy damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

id-00003.name: Med Repeaters
id-00003.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 240/360 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d10) energy damage.

id-00004.name: Stomp
id-00004.desc: All creatures standing within the AT-AT's space or within 5ft of it must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 78 (12d12) kinetic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

id-00005.name: Frightful Presence
id-00005.desc: Each creature of the AT-AT's choice within 240 feet of the AT-AT and aware of it must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or become Frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the AT-AT's Frightful Presence for 24 hours.

id-00001.name: Options
id-00001.desc: The AT-AT can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The AT-AT regains spent legendary actions at the start of their turn.

id-00002.name: Stomp
id-00002.desc: The AT-AT makes a stomp attack.

id-00003.name: Repeating Blasters
id-00003.desc: The AT-AT makes a single attack with its medium repeaters.

id-00004.name: Deploy Troops (Costs 2 Actions)
id-00004.desc: The AT-AT mobilizes some of the soldiers traveling within it. It deploys 1d4+2 Troopers and 1 74-Z speeder bike. These troops appear in any unoccupied spaces within 10 ft. of the AT-AT.

id-00001.name: Circuitry
id-00001.desc: The construct has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

id-00002.name: Piloted
id-00002.desc: The construct requires an active pilot to take any actions, and if the pilot is subjected to any conditions that the construct is not immune to, the construct is also subjected to those conditions. The pilot may take their own action or one of the actions granted by the construct.

id-00001.name: Redirect
id-00001.desc: If the construct's pilot takes damage from a source the pilot is aware of and can see, the construct can use its reaction to instead take that damage.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The construct makes two attacks with its repeating blaster cannon or uses its mortar launcher.

id-00002.name: Repeating Blaster Cannon
id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6+3) energy damage.

id-00003.name: Mortar Launcher
id-00003.desc: The construct launches a mortar at a point it can see within 100 feet. Each creature in a 20foot radius centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 14 (4d6) damage on a failed save, or half as much on a succesful one.

at_st.name: AT-ST
at_st.conditionimmunities: blinded, charmed, frightened, incapacitated, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned, diseased

id-00001.name: Towering
id-00001.desc: Creatures of Medium size or smaller can stand in the AT-ST's space.

id-00002.name: Piloted
id-00002.desc: The construct requires an active pilot to take any actions, and if the pilot is subjected to any conditions that the construct is not immune to, the construct is also subjected to those conditions. The pilot may take their own action or one of the actions granted by the construct.

id-00003.name: Circuitry
id-00003.desc: The construct has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

id-00004.name: Vulnerable Interior
id-00004.desc: The AT-ST's interior is vulnerable to damage done by grenades, mines and charges, unless it is immune to that damage. It also automatically fails all Dexterity saving throws from such effects that occur in its interior.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The AT-ST can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes two attacks with its medium repeating blasters or takes the Stomp action.

id-00002.name: Med Repeating Blasters
id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 120/240 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (4d10+3) energy damage.

id-00003.name: Stomp
id-00003.desc: All creatures standing within the AT-ST's space or within 5 feet of it must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 39 (6d12) kinetic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

id-00004.name: Frightful Presence
id-00004.desc: Each creature of the AT-ST's choice that is within 80 feet of the AT-ST and aware of it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the AT-ST's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

at_te.name: AT-TE
at_te.conditionimmunities: blinded, charmed, frightened, incapacitated, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned, diseased

id-00001.name: Circuitry
id-00001.desc: The construct has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

id-00002.name: Electromagnetic Shielding
id-00002.desc: The AT-TE is Immune to Ion damage.

id-00003.name: Heavy Durasteel Armor
id-00003.desc: The outer layer of the AT-TE is covered in heavy armor, making it difficult for smaller arms to damage it. Unless the damage from a single attack or effect exceeds 15 points, the AT-TE takes no damage from that attack. If the AT-TE takes an amount of damage from a single attack or effect equal to or greater than its damage threshold, it takes damage as normal.

id-00004.name: Piloted
id-00004.desc: The construct requires an active pilot to take any actions, and if the pilot is subjected to any conditions that the construct is not immune to, the construct is also subjected to those conditions. The pilot may take their own action or one of the actions granted by the construct.

id-00005.name: Towering
id-00005.desc: Creatures of Medium size or smaller can stand in the AT-TE's space.

id-00006.name: Troop Transport
id-00006.desc: The AT-TE can transport a maximum of 20 stormtroopers and five speeder bikes, which it can deploy using its Deploy Troops legendary action, or which can be fought by creatures inside of the AT-TE.

id-00007.name: Vulnerable Interior
id-00007.desc: The AT-TE's interior is vulnerable to damage done by grenades, mines and charges, unless it is immune to that damage. It also automatically fails all Dexterity saving throws from such effects that occur in its interior.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The AT-TE makes four attacks. one with its laser cannon volley and three with its medium repeaters.

id-00002.name: Laser Cannon Volley
id-00002.desc: The AT-TE chooses a point within 240 ft and lets loose a blast from its heavy laser cannon that explodes in a 15ft cube around that point. Each creature within the cube must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 33 (6d10) energy damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

id-00003.name: Med Repeaters
id-00003.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 120/240 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d10+3) energy damage.

id-00001.name: Options
id-00001.desc: The AT-TE can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The AT-TE regains spent legendary actions at the start of their turn.

id-00002.name: Repeating Blasters
id-00002.desc: The AT-TE makes a single attack with its medium repeaters.

id-00003.name: Deploy Troops (Costs 2 Actions)
id-00003.desc: The AT-TE mobilizes some of the soldiers traveling within it. It deploys 1d4+2 Troopers. These troops appear in any unoccupied spaces within 10 ft. of the AT-TE.

id-00001.name: Spellcasting
id-00001.desc: The explosives specialist is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The specialist has 27 tech points. The explosives specialist has the following spells prepared:\rCantrips (At will): combustive shot, electroshock, encrypted message\r1st level (27 slots): absorb energy, energy shield, oil slick, smoke cloud\r2nd level (27 slots): overheat, release, shocking ray\r3rd level (27 slots): explosion, sabotage charges

id-00001.name: Blaster Rifle
id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) energy damage.

id-00002.name: Breaching Charge
id-00002.desc: After spending at least 30 seconds setting the charge, the engineer may attach the charge to a surface. The charge can be set with a 6-second timer, or detonated remotely using a remote detonator, which the engineer has. Once detonated, the breaching charge destroys an unenhanced section of wall up to 10 feet wide, 10 feet tall, and 5 feet deep. Additionally, each creature within 20 feet of the charge must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 fire damage and 3d6 kinetic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. A construct makes this save with disadvantage. If the breaching charge is installed on the construct, it automatically fails the saving throw.

id-00001.name: Triage
id-00001.desc: Any friendly creature reduced to 0 HP within 15 feet of the field medic is automatically considered to be alive and stabilized.

id-00002.name: Spellcasting
id-00002.desc: The field medic is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The field medic has 14 tech points. The field medic has the following spells prepared:\rCantrips (At will): acid splash, temporary boost, warding shot\r1st level (14 slots): element of surprise, kolto pack, poison dart\r2nd level (14 slots): paralyze humanoid, toxin purge, shared shielding

id-00001.name: Blaster Carbine
id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) energy damage.

id-00001.name: Circuitry
id-00001.desc: The droid has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

id-00002.name: Interfaced Healing Protocol
id-00002.desc: While you are interfaced with this droid via the tracker droid interface tech power, when you restore hit points to a creature that is within 5 feet of your droid, you can roll the dice twice and take either total.

id-00001.name: Medkit (1/rest)
