id-00001.desc: As an action, the droid can expend a use of a medkit to stabilize a creature that has 0 hit points, without needing to make a Wisdom (Medicine) check.

id-00002.name: Medpac (1/day)
id-00002.desc: As an action, the droid uses a medpac to restore 2d4+2 hit points to a creature within 5 feet.

id-00003.name: Administer Antidote (1/rest)
id-00003.desc: As an action, the droid can administer a charge of an antidote kit to cure a target of one poison affecting them or to give them advantage on saving throws against poison for 1 hour.\rIt confers no benefit to droids or constructs.

grandadmiral.name: Grand Admiral
grandadmiral.skills: Athletics +8, Deception +12, Insight +20, Investigation +22, Perception +20, Persuasion +12
grandadmiral.languages: Galactic basic, Cheunh, and any 3 others

id-00001.name: Hardened Mind
id-00001.desc: When the Grand Admiral makes a saving throw against illusions or to resist charm and fear effects, it may add its Intelligence modifier (8) to the roll.

id-00002.name: Leadership (1/Rest)
id-00002.desc: For 1 minute, the Grand Admiral can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the Grand Admiral. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the Grand Admiral is incapacitated.

id-00003.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
id-00003.desc: If the Grand Admiral fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

id-00004.name: Sidearm Mastery
id-00004.desc: The Grand Admiral's ranged weapon attacks ignore half cover against targets within 15 feet of the Grand Admiral. The Grand Admiral gains a +3 bonus to attack rolls made with a pistol.

id-00005.name: Targeted Analysis
id-00005.desc: The Grand Admiral's attack rolls cannot suffer from disadvantage.

id-00006.name: Tech Resistance
id-00006.desc: The Grand Admiral has advantage on saving throws against tech powers.

id-00007.name: Innate Spellcasting
id-00007.desc: The grand admiral's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 23, +15 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:\rAt will: assess the situation, analyze, decryption program, detect enhancement, spot the weakness, detect invisibility, detect traps\r3/day each: element of surprise, explosion, tactical advantage, ballistic shield, salvo, friendly fire, greater analyze\r1/day each: contingency, find the path, tactical superiority, stun, predictive AI

id-00001.name: Calculated Timing
id-00001.desc: The Grand Admiral can focus a target down with the help with an ally. Once per round, whenever a creature is attacked by someone other than the Grand Admiral, the Grand Admiral can use its reaction to make one weapon attack against them.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The Grand Admiral makes three melee weapon attacks or three ranged weapon attacks.

id-00002.name: Heavy Pistol
id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, range 40/160 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (1d8 + 2d6 + 5) energy damage.

id-00003.name: Techblade
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) kinetic damage.

id-00004.name: Unarmed Strike
id-00004.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (1d4 + 2d6 + 5) kinetic damage.

id-00005.name: All-Out Attack (1/rest)
id-00005.desc: The Grand Admiral chooses a number of allies up to its Intelligence modifier (8) within 60 feet who can see or hear it. The chosen allies may then immediately use their reaction to make one weapon attack against a target of the Grand Admiral's choice. It may choose the target for each attack separately.

id-00001.name: Options
id-00001.desc: The Grand Admiral can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Grand Admiral regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

id-00002.name: Move
id-00002.desc: The Grand Admiral can move up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

id-00003.name: Casting
id-00003.desc: The Grand Admiral can cast an at-will power.

id-00004.name: Attack
id-00004.desc: The Grand Admiral makes one Heavy Pistol, Techblade, or Unarmed Strike attack.

gutkurr.name: Gutkurr
gutkurr.damageresistances: energy, kinetic, and ion from unenhanced weapons

id-00001.name: Wounded Fury
id-00001.desc: While it has 10 hit points or fewer, the gutkurr has advantage on attack rolls. In addition, it deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage to any target it hits with a melee attack.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The gutkuur can make two claw attacks.

id-00002.name: Claw
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Echolocation
id-00001.desc: The hawk-bat loses blindsight when deafened.

id-00002.name: Keen Hearing And Sight
id-00002.desc: The hawk-bat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing and sight.

id-00003.name: Pack Tactics
id-00003.desc: The hawk-bat has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hawk-bat's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

id-00001.name: Talons
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) kinetic damage.

hawk_batswarm.name: Hawk-bat Swarm
hawk_batswarm.conditionimmunities: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

id-00001.name: Swarm
id-00001.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Small hawk-bats. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

id-00002.name: Echolocation
id-00002.desc: The swarm can't use its blindsight while deafened.

id-00003.name: Keen Hearing And Sight
id-00003.desc: The swarm has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing and sight.

id-00001.name: Talons
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) kinetic damage or 7 (1d8 + 2) kinetic damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

id-00001.name: Keen Hearing And Smell
id-00001.desc: The hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

id-00002.name: Charge
id-00002.desc: If the hound moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a bite attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the hound can make another attack with its tusks against it as a bonus action.

id-00003.name: Pack Tactics
id-00003.desc: The hound has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hound's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

id-00001.name: Bite
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) kinetic damage.

id-00002.name: Tusk
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Charge
id-00001.desc: If the hrumph moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

id-00001.name: Gore
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) kinetic damage.

hssiss.name: Hssiss
hssiss.languages: Understands Sith commands but can't speak

id-00001.name: Amphibious
id-00001.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.

id-00002.name: Sith-born
id-00002.desc: Dark forcecasters and Sith (species) have advantage on Animal Handling checks against Hssiss.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The Hssiss makes three attacks, once with its bite and twice with its claws.

id-00002.name: Bite
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 14 (3d8+4) kinetic damage. The creature must then succeed on a Constitution saving throw (DC 17) or become poisoned and take 6 (2d6) toxin damage per turn. The target is also grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the Hssiss can't bite another target.

id-00003.name: Claws
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 11 (3d6+4) kinetic damage. The creature must then succeed on a Constitution saving throw (DC 15) or become poisoned and take 6 (2d6) toxin damage per turn.

id-00004.name: Invisibility
id-00004.desc: The Hssiss magically turns Invisible until it attacks, or until its Concentration ends (as if concentrating on a power).

id-00001.name: Circuitry
id-00001.desc: The droid has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

id-00001.name: Shockprod
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 lightning damage.

inquisitorknight.name: Inquisitor Knight
inquisitorknight.languages: Galactic Basic, one more of your choice

id-00001.name: Force Resistance
id-00001.desc: The inquisitor has advantage on saving throws against force powers.

id-00002.name: War Casting
id-00002.desc: When the inquisitor uses an action to cast a force power, they can use a bonus action to make a Double Saber attack.

id-00003.name: Spellcasting
id-00003.desc: The inquisitor knight is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The inquisitor knight has 18 Force Points. The inquisitor knight has the following spells prepared:\rCantrips (At will): denounce, force disarm, saber throw, slow\r1st level (18 slots): dark side tendrils, fear, force jump, force sight, hex, sense force, stun

id-00001.name: Spinning Double Saber
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) energy damage.

id-00002.name: Double Saber
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) energy damage.

inquisitormaster.name: Inquisitor Master
inquisitormaster.languages: Galactic Basic, two more of your choice

id-00001.name: Force Resistance
id-00001.desc: The inquisitor has advantage on saving throws against force powers.

id-00002.name: War Casting
id-00002.desc: When the inquisitor uses an action to cast a force power, they can use a bonus action to make a Double Saber attack.

id-00003.name: Spellcasting
id-00003.desc: The inquisitor master is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The inquisitor master has 33 force points. The inquisitor master has the following spells prepared:\rCantrips (At will): denounce, force disarm, force push/pull, mind trick, saber throw, slow\r1st level (33 slots): animate weapon, improved dark side tendrils, choke, drain life, force sight, force suppression, horror, force jump, sense force, sever force, stun

id-00001.name: Spinning Double Saber
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) energy damage.

id-00002.name: Double Saber
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) energy damage.

id-00003.name: Dark Lightning
id-00003.desc: Ranged Power Attack. +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one or two targets. Hit: 14 (4d6) necrotic damage.\rThe target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or become restrained until the end of the inquisitor's next turn.

inquisitor_grand.name: Inquisitor, Grand
inquisitor_grand.languages: Galactic Basic, two more of your choice

id-00001.name: Detect Force
id-00001.desc: The inquisitor can sense the presence and direction of a creature who can cast force powers within 120 ft.

id-00002.name: Force Resistance
id-00002.desc: The inquisitor has advantage on saving throws against force powers and resistance to damage dealt by force powers.

id-00003.name: War Casting
id-00003.desc: When the inquisitor uses an action to cast a force power, they can use a bonus action to make a Spinning Double Saber attack.

id-00004.name: Spellcasting
id-00004.desc: The inquisitor, grand is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). The Grand Inquisitor has 41 force points. The inquisitor, grand has the following spells prepared:\rCantrips (At will): denounce, force disarm, force push/pull, mind trick, saber throw, slow\r1st level (41 slots): animate weapon, dominate mind, improved dark side tendrils, choke, force suppression, horror, force jump, sense force, sever force, siphon life, stun

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The inquisitor makes three spinning double saber attacks.

id-00002.name: Spinning Double Saber
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (4d8 + 5) energy damage.

id-00003.name: Dark Lightning
id-00003.desc: Ranged Power Attack. +10 to hit, range 120 ft., one or two targets. Hit: 28 (8d6) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or become restrained until the end of the inquisitor's next turn.

isbinfiltrator.name: ISB Infiltrator
isbinfiltrator.languages: Galactic Basic, one other of your choice

id-00001.name: Cunning Action
id-00001.desc: On each of its turns, the infiltrator can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

id-00002.name: Evasion
id-00002.desc: If the infiltrator is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dex saving throw to take only half damage, the infiltrator instead takes no damage on a success, and half damage on a fail.

id-00003.name: Spellcasting
id-00003.desc: The isb infiltrator is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The infiltrator has 15 tech points. The isb infiltrator has the following spells prepared:\rCantrips (At will): electrical burst, encrypted message, on/off\r1st level (15 slots): holographic disguise, smoke cloud, tranquilizer\r2nd level (15 slots): infiltrate, shocking ray

id-00001.name: Uncanny Dodge
id-00001.desc: The infiltrator halves the damage that it takes from an attack that hits it.

id-00001.name: Blaster Carbine
id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) energy damage.\rThe attack deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when the infiltrator has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the infiltrator and the infiltrator doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

isbofficer.name: ISB Officer
isbofficer.languages: Galactic Basic, one other of your choice

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The Officer makes two attacks.

id-00002.name: Blaster Pistol
id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 40/160, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) energy damage.

id-00003.name: Rally Troops
id-00003.desc: (recharge 5-6) The Officer rallies his troops, giving all allies within 60 feet advantage on their next attack roll.

it_ointerrogationunit.name: IT-O Interrogation Unit
it_ointerrogationunit.languages: Binary, knows Basic but can't speak it

id-00001.name: Flyby
id-00001.desc: The IT-O Unit doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

id-00001.name: Dart Launcher
id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 15/60 ft., one target. Hit: 1 kinetic damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a Con. saving throw (DC 12) or become stunned for one round.

id-00001.name: Keen Hearing
id-00001.desc: The jakrab has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

id-00001.name: Bite
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 kinetic damage.

jawascrapper.name: Jawa Scrapper
jawascrapper.languages: Jawaese, understands but doesn't speak Galactic Basic

id-00001.name: Nimble Escape
id-00001.desc: The jawa can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

id-00001.name: Ion Blaster
id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 40/160 ft., one creature. Hit 3 (1d4 + 2) ion damage.

id-00002.name: Ion Grenade (3/day)
id-00002.desc: The jawa throws a grenade at a point it can see within 20 ft. Each creature within 10 feet must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 2d4 ion damage on a failed save, or half as much as on a successful one. Any electronics within the blast radius are disabled until rebooted.

jawatinkerer.name: Jawa Tinkerer
jawatinkerer.languages: Jawaese, understands but doesn't speak Galactic Basic

id-00001.name: Nimble Escape
id-00001.desc: The jawa can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

id-00002.name: Spellcasting
id-00002.desc: The jawa tinkerer is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The jawa has 6 tech points. The jawa tinkerer has the following spells prepared:\rCantrips (At will): electroshock, mending, on/off\r1st level (6 slots): oil slick, overload, repair droid

id-00001.name: Spellcasting
id-00001.desc: Grovel, Cower, and Beg. The jawa cowers pathetically to distract nearby foes. Until the end of its next turn, its allies gain advantage on attack rolls against any target within 10 feet of the jawa.

jawashaman.name: Jawa Shaman
jawashaman.languages: Jawaese, understands but doesn't speak Galactic Basic

id-00001.name: Nimble Escape
id-00001.desc: The jawa can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

id-00002.name: Spellcasting
id-00002.desc: The jawa shaman is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The jawa has 18 force points. The jawa shaman has the following spells prepared:\rCantrips (At will): affect mind, give life, spare the dying\r1st level (18 slots): beast trick, heal, heroism\r2nd level (18 slots): restoration, stun

id-00001.name: Vibrostaff
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 5 (2d4) kinetic damage. Grovel, Cower, and Beg. The jawa cowers pathetically to distract nearby foes. Until the end of its next turn, its allies gain advantage on attack rolls against any target within 10 feet of the jawa.

id-00001.name: Circuitry
id-00001.desc: The droid has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The junkyard droid makes two blaster carbine attacks or two vibroblade attacks.

id-00002.name: Blaster Carbine
id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) energy damage.

id-00003.name: Vibroblade
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Circuitry
id-00001.desc: The droid has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The junk behemoth makes two blaster cannon attacks or two slam attacks.

id-00002.name: Blaster Cannon
id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10+1) energy damage.

id-00003.name: Slam
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10+3) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Swarm Tactics
id-00001.desc: The K'lor'slug has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the k'lor'slug's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

id-00001.name: Bite
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) poison damage. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

id-00001.name: Diving Ambush
id-00001.desc: If the katarn drops on a target from above and then hits it with a bite attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) kinetic damage per 10 feet fallen, up to 21 (6d6). If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the katarn misses, it takes half normal falling damage.

id-00002.name: Keen Sight And Smell
id-00002.desc: The katarn has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight and smell.

id-00001.name: Bite
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) kinetic damage.

id-00002.name: Claws
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Keen Hearing And Smell
id-00001.desc: The hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

id-00002.name: Pack Tactics
id-00002.desc: The hound has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hound's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

id-00001.name: Bite
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Villainous Hit Points
id-00001.desc: Cyborg Khagan has multiple pools of hit points, each of which is tracked separately.\rDamage and healing only applies to the currently active hit point pool. When a pool is depleted of all hit points, it becomes inactive. Only one pool can be active at any time.\rIf a hit point pool is depleted, the Cyborg Khagan immediately saves against all ongoing conditions and effects. Any abilities which can reset do so.\rIf all pools of hit points are inactive, Cyborg Khagan is killed. If Cyborg Khagan takes a long rest, it fully heals the currently active pool and fully heals one depleted pool.

id-00002.name: Villainous Exhaustion
id-00002.desc: Cyborg Khagan rolls initiative with advantage. Cyborg Khagan starts with a number of villainous actions equal to one less than it's villainous multiplier.\rIf a hit point pool is depleted, Cyborg Khagan also loses one villainous action.\rCyborg Khagan may use a villainous action after any other creature takes a turn. If Cyborg Khagan does so, it regains its reaction.\rA villainous action is a complete turn. They have an action, bonus action and may move up to their full speed.\rThe villainous actions refresh at the start of Cyborg Khagan's turn and any remaining actions from the previous turn are lost.

id-00003.name: Jedi Slayer
id-00003.desc: Cyborg Khagan has advantage on saving throws versus Force Powers used by enemies within 5 ft.\rWhen an enemy within 5 ft. uses a force power, Cyborg Khagan can make a melee attack against that character as a reaction. When Cyborg Khagan damages an enemy character, they have disadvantage on Concentration saves to maintain their Force powers.

id-00004.name: Rage
id-00004.desc: On Cyborg Khagan's turn, he may choose to go into a Rage as a bonus action. While in a rage, his attacks deal +3 damage, he has Advantage on strength-based skill checks and saving throws, and he has resistance to kinetic and energy damage. As part of the bonus action to go into a Rage, he can make a Lightsaber or unarmed attack. While in a Rage, all attacks against him have Advantage. The Rage lasts for 1 minute, or until Cyborg Khagan ends his rage as a Bonus action, or until Cyborg Khagan falls unconscious or loses all hitpoints in his current health pool.

id-00005.name: More Machine Than Man
id-00005.desc: Cyborg Khagan has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

id-00006.name: Cowardice
id-00006.desc: While Cyborg Khagan has only one health pool remaining, he has Advantage on Stealth and Acrobatics checks, and he can take the Dash or Disengage actions as a Bonus action.

id-00001.name: Parry
id-00001.desc: When Cyborg Khagan is attacked and hit by an adjacent character while he is holding one or more Lightsabers, he may use his reaction to reduce the damage taken by 1d10+15. If the damage is reduced to 0, he may use this reaction to make a Lightsaber attack against the attacker.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: On each of his turns, Cyborg Khagan can use one of Crush Them!, Frightful Presence, or Whirling Advance and then make one Unarmed Slam, Lightsaber, or Blaster attack; or he may make two attacks.

id-00002.name: Lightsaber
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6+5 energy damage.

id-00003.name: Unarmed Slam
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack.+9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6+5 kinetic damage Heavy Blaster Pistol. Ranged Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, range 40/160, one target. Hit: 1d8+3 energy damage. Crush Them!. Choose an ally within 30'. That ally can use their reaction to make an attack. If that attack hits, it deals an additional 1d8 damage.

id-00004.name: Frightful Presence
id-00004.desc: Choose any number of characters within 80'. Each of those characters who fails a Wisdom saving throw (DC 14) becomes frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the Cyborg Khagan's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

id-00005.name: Whirling Advance
id-00005.desc: Whirling his blades, Cyborg Khagan advances with a shield of sparks and light. Choose a character within 30' to make a Dexterity Save (DC 19). On a fail, the target is pushed 10 feet, Cyborg Khagan moves into their current square ignoring opportunity attacks, and he has Advantage on his next attack against them this combat. On a success, Cyborg Khagan moves into a square adjacent to the target and Opportunity Attacks against Cyborg Khagan have Disadvantage during that move.

id-00001.name: Rampage
id-00001.desc: When the Blackarm reduces a creature to 0 Hit Points with a melee Attack on its turn, the Kolkpravis Blackarm can take a Bonus Action to move up to half its speed and make a bite Attack.

id-00002.name: Keen Smell
id-00002.desc: The Blackarm has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The Blackarm makes two attacks, either with its Greater Shoni Spear or its Outland Rifle, and uses Incite Rampage if it can.

id-00002.name: Lig Sword
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit 6 (1d8 + 2) kinetic damage.

id-00003.name: Greater Shoni Spear
id-00003.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10ft., one target. Hit 8 (1d10 + 3) kinetic damage.

id-00004.name: Outland Rifle
id-00004.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120, one target. Hit 5 (1d6 + 2) kinetic damage.

id-00005.name: Incite Rampage (Recharge 5-6)
id-00005.desc: One creature the Kolkpravis' Blackarm can see within 30 feet of it can use its reaction to make a melee attack if it can hear the Kolkpravis Blackarm and has the Rampage trait.

id-00001.name: Keen Smell
id-00001.desc: The Kolkpravis Khan has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

id-00002.name: Aura Of Rage
id-00002.desc: If the flind isn't incapacitated, any creature with the Rampage trait can make a bite attack as a bonus action while within 10 feet of the flind. Shurpak's Fury. The Khagan deals an extra 4 (1d8) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).

id-00001.name: Parry
id-00001.desc: The Khan adds 3 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, the Royal Guard must see the attacker and bewielding a melee weapon.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The Kolkpravis Khagan makes three melee attacks once with Blade of Plague and twice with Blade of Pain.

id-00002.name: Blade of Plague
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit 13 (1d8 + 5 plus 1d8) kinetic damage and the target must succed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or become Poisoned.

id-00003.name: Blade of Pain
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5ft. or range 20/60, one target. Hit 13 (1d8 + 5 plus 1d8) kinetic damage plus 20 (4d10) lightining damage.

id-00004.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
id-00004.desc: For 1 minute, the Khan can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 ft. of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the Khan. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the Khan is incapacitated.

id-00001.name: Keen Smell
id-00001.desc: The Kolkpravis Khan has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

id-00002.name: Rampage
id-00002.desc: When the Kolkpravis Khan reduces a creature to 0 Hit Points with a melee Attack on its turn, the Kolkpravis Warrior can take a Bonus Action to move up to half its speed and make a bite Attack. Shurpak's Fury. The Khan deals an extra 4 (1d8) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).

id-00001.name: Parry
id-00001.desc: The Khan adds 3 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, the Royal Guard must see the attacker and bewielding a melee weapon.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The Kolkpravis Khan makes three melee attacks with its Lig Sword or its Greater Shoni Spear.

id-00002.name: Lig Sword
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit 12 (1d8 + 4 plus 1d8) kinetic damage.

id-00003.name: Greater Shoni Spear
id-00003.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5ft. or range 20/60, one target. Hit 13 (1d10 + 4 plus 1d8) kinetic damage.

id-00004.name: Outland Rifle
id-00004.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 30/120, one target. Hit 5 (1d6 + 3) kinetic damage.

id-00005.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
id-00005.desc: For 1 minute, the Khan can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 ft. of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the Khan. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the Khan is incapacitated.

id-00001.name: Keen Smell
id-00001.desc: The Tarkhan has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

id-00002.name: Rampage
id-00002.desc: When the Tarkhan reduces a creature to 0 Hit Points with a melee Attack on its turn, the Kolkpravis Tarkhan can take a Bonus Action to move up to half its speed and make a bite Attack.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The Tarkhan makes two meelee attacks with its Greater Shoni Spear.

id-00002.name: Lig Sword
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit 6 (1d8 + 3) kinetic damage.

id-00003.name: Greater Shoni Spear
id-00003.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10ft., one target. Hit 8 (1d10 + 3) kinetic damage.

id-00004.name: Outland Rifle
id-00004.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120, one target. Hit 5 (1d6 + 2) kinetic damage.

id-00005.name: Battle Cry (1/Day)
id-00005.desc: Each creature of the Tarkhan's choice that is within 30 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by Battle Cry gain advantage on attack rolls until the start of the Tarkhan's next turn. The war chief can then make one attack as a bonus action.

id-00001.name: Keen Smell
id-00001.desc: The Kolkpravis Warrior has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

id-00002.name: Rampage
id-00002.desc: When the Kolkpravis Warrior reduces a creature to 0 Hit Points with a melee Attack on its turn, the Kolkpravis Warrior can take a Bonus Action to move up to half its speed and make a bite Attack.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The Kolkpravis Warrior makes two meelee attacks with its Shoni Spear or two ranged attack with its slugthrower.

id-00002.name: Lig Sword
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: 34 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit 5 (1d8 + 1) kinetic damage.

id-00003.name: Shoni Spear
id-00003.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5ft. or range 20/60, one target. Hit 4 (1d6 + 1) kinetic damage.

id-00004.name: Sudden Rush
id-00004.desc: Until the end of the turn, the Kolkpravis Warrior's speed increases by 60 feet and it doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

kraytdragon_adult.name: Krayt Dragon, Adult
kraytdragon_adult.damageresistances: energy, ion, kinetic from nonmagical weapons
kraytdragon_adult.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 18

id-00001.name: Legendary Resistance
id-00001.desc: (3/Day). If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

id-00002.name: Tunneler
id-00002.desc: The dragon can burrow through solid rock at half it burrowing speed and leaves a 15-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks. one with its bite and two with its claws.

id-00002.name: Bite
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) kinetic damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

id-00003.name: Claw
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) kinetic damage.

id-00004.name: Tail Stinger
id-00004.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) kinetic damage. The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

id-00005.name: Frightful Presence
id-00005.desc: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 ft. of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

id-00006.name: Venom Spray (Recharge 5-6)
id-00006.desc: The dragon spits poison in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 56 (16d6) poison damage damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

id-00001.name: Options
id-00001.desc: Krayt Dragon can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Krayt Dragon regains spent legendary actions at the start of their turn.

id-00002.name: Detect
id-00002.desc: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

id-00003.name: Swat Away
id-00003.desc: The dragon makes a claw attack. If the attack hits, the target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet in a straight line away from the dragon. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target falls prone.

id-00004.name: Tail Attack
id-00004.desc: The dragon makes a tail stinger attack.

id-00001.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
id-00001.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks. one with its bite and two with its claws.

id-00002.name: Bite
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (2d10 + 10) kinetic damage plus 7 (3d4) toxin damage. The target must then succeed on a Constitution saving throw (DC 19) or become poisoned.

id-00003.name: Claw
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d6 + 10) kinetic damage. plus 7 (3d4) toxin damage.

id-00004.name: Tail
id-00004.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d8 + 10) kinetic damage.

id-00005.name: Frightful Presence
id-00005.desc: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

id-00006.name: Poisonous Saliva (Recharge 5-6)
id-00006.desc: The dragon spits its poisonous saliva in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 24 Constitution saving throw, taking 67 (15d8) toxin damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

id-00001.name: Options
id-00001.desc: The greater krayt dragon can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time, and only at the end of another creature's turn. The greater krayt dragon regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

id-00002.name: Detect
id-00002.desc: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

id-00003.name: Tail Attack
id-00003.desc: The dragon makes a tail attack.

id-00004.name: Sand Swimmer (Costs 2 Actions)
id-00004.desc: The greater krayt dragon dives into the ground, sand blasting all creatures around it. Each creature within 15 ft. of the dragon must succeed on a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw or take 17 (2d6 + 10) kinetic damage and be knocked prone. The greater krayt dragon is now burrowed.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The dragon makes three attacks. one with its bite and two with its claws.

id-00002.name: Bite
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) kinetic damage plus 4 (2d4) toxin damage. The target must then succeed on a Constitution saving throw (DC 15) or become poisoned.

id-00003.name: Claw
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) kineric damage plus 4 (2d4) toxin damage.

id-00004.name: Poisonous Saliva (Recharge 5-6)
id-00004.desc: The dragon spits its poisonous saliva in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) tocin damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

knobbywhitespider.name: Knobby White Spider
knobbywhitespider.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10

id-00001.name: Distress Spores
id-00001.desc: When the spider takes damage, all other spiders within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

id-00002.name: False Appearance
id-00002.desc: While the spider remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal gnarltree.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The spider makes two slam attacks.

id-00002.name: Slam
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) kinetic damage.

id-00003.name: Pacifying Spores (3/Day)
id-00003.desc: The spider ejects spores in 15foot cone. All creatures in the area must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

id-00004.name: Stinger
id-00004.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) kinetic damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

id-00001.name: Distress Spores
id-00001.desc: When the spider takes damage, all other spiders within 240 feet of it can sense its pain.

id-00001.name: Slam
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) kinetic damage.

id-00002.name: Stinger
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) kinetic damage, and the target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

legendaryt_doshokhunter.name: Legendary T'doshok Hunter
legendaryt_doshokhunter.skills: Piloting +6, Athletics +11, Intimidation +7, Perception +8, Technology +6, Stealth +14

id-00001.name: Stinger
id-00001.desc: Languages

id-00002.name: Commando
id-00002.desc: As a bonus action, the trandoshan can take the Dash and Hide actions on each of his turns.

id-00003.name: Infrared Vision
id-00003.desc: The trandoshan has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

id-00004.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
id-00004.desc: If the trandoshan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

id-00005.name: Mortar Gun
id-00005.desc: As a bonus action, the trandoshan can switch the firing mode of his mortar gun between a blaster and a grenade launcher.

id-00006.name: Precision Shot (2/Day)
id-00006.desc: The trandoshan can roll his next ranged attack with advantage.

id-00007.name: Regeneration
id-00007.desc: The trandoshan regains 15 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

id-00008.name: Sharpshooting Mastery
id-00008.desc: The trandoshan's ranged attacks ignore half-cover and three-quarters cover, and attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on his ranged weapon attack rolls.

id-00001.name: Dioxus Escape
id-00001.desc: As a reaction when the trandoshan takes at least 20 damage from a melee attack, it can move up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.\rAdditionally, if it's Dioxus Grenade ability is available the trandoshan can choose to drop a grenade where it was before its movement. The dioxus grenade detonates after the trandoshan has completed his movement.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The trandoshan makes three claw attacks.\rAlternatively, it can make two ranged attacks with its mortar gun (blaster form only).

id-00002.name: Claw
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) kinetic damage.

id-00003.name: Mortar Gun (Blaster Form)
id-00003.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (1d12 + 8) energy damage.

id-00004.name: Mortar Gun (Grenade Launcher Form)
id-00004.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack.\r+9 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (1d10 + 8) kinetic damage. Hit or miss, the target and everycreature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 (4d6) kinetic damage.

id-00005.name: Dioxus Grenade (Recharge 5-6)
id-00005.desc: The trandoshan throws a dioxus grenade, choosing a point within 45 ft., exploding in a 15 ft. sphere. The fog lasts 1 round and the area is heavily obscured. When a creature enters the poison's area or starts its turn there, that creature must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 22 (4d10) poison damage and is poisoned for 1 minute. On a success, the creature takes half the damage and isn't poisoned.

id-00001.name: Options
id-00001.desc: The trandoshan can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The trandoshan regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

id-00002.name: Dioxus Grenade (Costs 2 Actions)
id-00002.desc: The trandoshan uses its Dioxus Grenade action. If it is unavailable, the trandoshan can roll to try and recharge it, using the grenade upon a successful recharge.

id-00003.name: Heavy Fire
id-00003.desc: The trandoshan makes one mortar gun attack.

id-00004.name: Move
id-00004.desc: The trandoshan can move up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

lylek.name: Lylek
lylek.damageresistances: energy, ion, kinetic from nonmagical weapons

id-00001.name: Tunneler
id-00001.desc: The lylek can burrow through solid rock at half it burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The lylek can make three attacks. two with its legs or tentacles and one with its tail stinger.

id-00002.name: Leg Spear
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) kinetic damage.

id-00003.name: Tail Stinger
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) kinetic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) poison damage. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

id-00004.name: Tentacle
id-00004.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) kinetic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 15). The lylek can have up to two creatures grappled at the same time.

massiff.name: Massiff
massiff.damageresistances: energy, ion, kinetic from nonmagical weapons

id-00001.name: Keen Hearing And Smell
id-00001.desc: The massiff has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

id-00002.name: Spiked Hide
id-00002.desc: Any creature that grapples the massif takes 3 (1d6) kinetic damage at the end of its turn.

id-00001.name: Bite
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Unarmored Defense
id-00001.desc: While the Mistryl is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her AC includes her Wisdom modifier.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The Mistryl makes three unarmed strikes or three dart attacks.

id-00002.name: Unarmed Strike
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) kinetic damage. If the target is a creature, the Mistryl can choose one of the following additional effects. The target must Succeed on a DC 13.\r-Strength saving throw or drop one item it is holding (Mistryl's choice).\r-Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.\r-Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the Mistryl's next turn.

id-00003.name: Dart
id-00003.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) kinetic damage and the target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw.\rOn a failure, the target takes 7 (2d6) poison damage and is poisoned for 1 minute. On a success, the target takes half the damage and isn't poisoned.

mistrylmaster.name: Mistryl Master
mistrylmaster.skills: Acrobatics +7, Athletics +3, Deception +5, Insight +6, Perception +6, Stealth +7

id-00001.name: Cunning Action
id-00001.desc: On each of her turns, the Mistryl can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

id-00002.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
id-00002.desc: The Mistryl deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the Mistryl that isn't incapacitated and the Mistryl doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

id-00001.name: Uncanny Dodge
id-00001.desc: The Mistryl halves the damage that she takes from an attack that hits her. The Mistryl must be able to see the attacker.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The Mistryl makes three melee weapon attacks or three ranged weapon attacks.

id-00002.name: Techblade
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) kinetic damage.

id-00003.name: Holdout Blaster
id-00003.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) kinetic damage.

mistrylprime.name: Mistryl Prime
mistrylprime.skills: Acrobatics +8, Athletics +4, Deception +6, Insight +7, Perception +7, Sleight of Hand +8, Stealth +8

id-00001.name: Assassinate
id-00001.desc: During her first turn, the Mistryl has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the Mistryl scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

id-00002.name: Cunning Action
id-00002.desc: On each of her turns, she can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

id-00003.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
id-00003.desc: The Mistryl deals an extra 17 (5d6) damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the Mistryl that isn't incapacitated and the Mistryl doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

id-00004.name: Spellcasting
id-00004.desc: The mistryl prime is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The mistryl has 22 tech points. The mistryl prime has the following spells prepared:\rCantrips (At will): encrypted message, light, poison spray\r1st level (22 slots): alarm, decryption program, holographic disguise\r2nd level (22 slots): concealed caltrops, infiltrate, paralyze humanoid\r3rd level (22 slots): invisibility to cameras, tactical advantage

id-00001.name: Uncanny Dodge
id-00001.desc: The Mistryl halves the damage that she takes from an attack that hits her. The Mistryl must be able to see the attacker.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The Mistryl makes two melee weapon attacks or two ranged weapon attacks.

id-00002.name: Techblade
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) kinetic damage, and the target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the target takes 24 (7d6) poison damage and is poisoned for 1 minute. On a success, the target takes half damage and isn't poisoned.

id-00003.name: Holdout Blaster
id-00003.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) energy damage.

moleserpent_adult.name: Mole Serpent, Adult
moleserpent_adult.senses: blindsight 30 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 14

id-00001.name: Bite
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d8 + 9) kinetic damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the mole serpent. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the mole serpent, and it takes 14 (4d6) acid damage at the start of each of the mole serpent's turns.\rIf the mole serpent takes 25 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the mole serpent must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the mole serpent. If the mole serpent dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

mucoussalamander.name: Mucous Salamander
mucoussalamander.damageresistances: energy, ion, kinetic from nonmagical weapons (solid form)

id-00001.name: Shifting Molecules
id-00001.desc: When the salamander enters or exits water, it changes the form of its molecular structure to mimic its surroundings. Other than its AC, its statistics are the same in each form. Any object it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

id-00002.name: Amphibious
id-00002.desc: The salamander can breathe air and water.

id-00003.name: Diffuse Body (Liquid Form Only)
id-00003.desc: The salamander can move through other creatures and objects no more than 10 feet in diameter as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) kinetic damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

id-00004.name: Spider Climb (Solid Form Only)
id-00004.desc: The salamander can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

id-00005.name: Spiked Hide (Solid Form Only)
id-00005.desc: Any creature that grapples the salamander takes 3 (1d6) kinetic damage at the end of its turn.

id-00006.name: Watery Stealth (Liquid Form Only)
id-00006.desc: While underwater, the salamander has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide, and it can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

id-00001.name: Bite
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 2) kinetic damage.

id-00002.name: Claw (Solid Form Only)
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Charge
id-00001.desc: If the moof moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) kinetic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

id-00002.name: Beast Of Burden
id-00002.desc: The moof is considered to be a Huge animal for the purposes of determining its carrying capacity.

id-00001.name: Gore
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Charge
id-00001.desc: If the mott moves at least 15 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) kinetic damage.

id-00002.name: Keen Hearing
id-00002.desc: The mott has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

id-00001.name: Ram
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Ram
id-00001.desc: Languages

id-00002.name: Shadow Stealth
id-00002.desc: While lightly or heavily obscured, the narglatch can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

id-00003.name: Sure-footed
id-00003.desc: The narglatch has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

id-00001.name: Pounce
id-00001.desc: If the narglatch moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the narglatch can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

id-00002.name: Bite
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d10 + 2) kinetic damage.

id-00003.name: Claw
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 2) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Light Pistol
id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 40/160 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) energy damage.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The Navy Trooper makes two blaster carbine attacks.

id-00002.name: Blaster Carbine
id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) energy damage.

id-00001.name: Charge
id-00001.desc: If the nerf moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) kinetic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

id-00001.name: Gore
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) kinetic damage.

id-00002.name: Spit
id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 15/30 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) acid damage.

id-00001.name: Inflate (Recharges After A Short Or Long Rest)
id-00001.desc: As a bonus action, the nuna increases in size for 1 minute.\rAnything it is wearing or carrying does not increase in size. While inflated, the nuna is Small, doubles its damage dice on attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Charisma (Intimidation) checks with advantage.\rIf the nuna lacks the room to become Small, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

id-00001.name: Talons
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) kinetic damage or 6 (2d4 +1) kinetic damage while inflated.

nexu.name: Nexu
nexu.senses: darkvision 60 ft., truesight 60 ft., passive Perception 15

id-00001.name: Avoidance
id-00001.desc: If the nexu is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails .

id-00002.name: Keen Sight And Smell
id-00002.desc: The nexu has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight and smell.

id-00003.name: Pounce
id-00003.desc: If the nexu moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the nexu can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The nexu can make two claw attacks.

id-00002.name: Bite
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) kinetic damage.

id-00003.name: Claw
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) kinetic damage.

id-00001.name: Aura Of Command
id-00001.desc: Friendly creatures that it can see and hear the junior officer within 30 feet of it add a +1 bonus to their attack and damage rolls. This effect ends if the officer is incapacitated.

id-00001.name: Human Shield
id-00001.desc: When the officer is targeted by a ranged attack while an ally is within 5 ft of it, the officer can use its reaction to cause that ally to be targeted by the attack instead.

id-00001.name: Blaster Carbine
id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) energy damage.

id-00002.name: Command Ally
id-00002.desc: The junior officer targets one ally within 30 feet of it. If the target can hear the officer, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

id-00001.name: Superior Aura Of Command
id-00001.desc: Friendly creatures that it can see and hear the junior officer within 30 feet of it add a +2 bonus to their attack and damage rolls. This effect ends if the officer is incapacitated.

id-00001.name: Human Shield
id-00001.desc: When the officer is targeted by a ranged attack while an ally is within 5 ft of it, the officer can use its reaction to cause that ally to be targeted by the attack instead.

id-00001.name: Blaster Carbine
id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) energy damage.

id-00002.name: Call to Attack
id-00002.desc: Up to three allies within 120 feet of this officer that can hear it can each use their reaction to make one weapon attack.

id-00003.name: Rally Allies
id-00003.desc: The officer targets up to three allies within 120 feet that can hear it and are currently suffering from a fear or charm effect. The fear or charm effect is removed.

pelkobug.name: Pelko Bug
pelkobug.speed: 20 ft., burrow 20 ft., climb 20 ft., fly 30 ft.

id-00001.name: Bug Climb
id-00001.desc: The Pelko Bug can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check. Due to being tiny, the Pelko Bug can occupy the same spot as another creature. To attack the Pelko Bug must be climbing on the target.

id-00002.name: Penetrating Spikes
id-00002.desc: The Pelko Bug's microscopic barbs can penetrate even through the toughest armor. The Pelko Bug gains +5 to hit (Incorporated to attack).

id-00001.name: Barbs
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 (2d4-1) kinetic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 2 poison damage and become paralyzed.

pelkobugswarm.name: Pelko Bug Swarm
pelkobugswarm.speed: 20 ft., burrow 20 ft., climb 20 ft., fly 30 ft.
pelkobugswarm.conditionimmunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

id-00001.name: Swarm
id-00001.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a tiny bug. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

id-00002.name: Penetrating Spikes
id-00002.desc: The Pelko Bug's microscopic barbs can penetrate even through the toughest armor. The Pelko Bug gains +5 to hit (Incorporated to attack).

id-00001.name: Barbs (swarm has more than half HP)
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature. Hit: 15 (4d4-1) kinetic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 2 poison damage and become paralyzed.

id-00002.name: Barbs (swarm has half HP or less)
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (2d4-1) kinetic damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 2 poison damage and become paralyzed.

id-00001.name: Circuitry
id-00001.desc: The droid has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

id-00002.name: Magnetic Lock
id-00002.desc: The droid can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

id-00003.name: Interfaced Damage Protocol
id-00003.desc: While you are interfaced with this droid via the tracker droid interface tech power, when you roll a 1 or 2 on a damage die for a tech power while your droid is within 5 feet of you, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll, even if the new roll is a 1 or a 2.

id-00004.name: Pack Tactics
id-00004.desc: The droid has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the buzz droid's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

id-00001.name: Miniature Plasma Cutter
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 ion damage.

id-00001.name: Circuitry
id-00001.desc: The droid has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

id-00002.name: Crafter Protocol
id-00002.desc: The droid comes with proficiency in three tools, chosen when it is crafted.

id-00003.name: Interfaced Crafting Protocol
id-00003.desc: While you are interfaced with this droid via the tracker droid interface tech power, whenever you make an ability check using tools with which the droid is also proficient, you have advantage on the check. If you already have advantage, you can instead reroll one of the dice once.

id-00004.name: Powerful Build
id-00004.desc: The droid counts as one size larger when determining carrying capacity and the weight it can push, drag, or lift.

id-00005.name: Turtle (1/Rest)
id-00005.desc: The first time the droid would drop to zero hit points, the droid can instead remain at one hit point and temporarily deactivate and fold up into a tougher, immobile form. While turtled, the droid has an AC of 14, and is considered paralyzed. The creature interfaced with this droid can use a bonus action to restore this droid to it's unturtled condition.

id-00001.name: Kick
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 kinetic damage.

id-00002.name: Repair (1/day)
id-00002.desc: As an action, the droid can expend one use of a repair kit to restore 2d4+2 hit points to a droid or construct within 5 feet.

id-00001.name: Circuitry
id-00001.desc: The droid has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

id-00002.name: Flyby
id-00002.desc: The droid doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

id-00003.name: Keen Hearing And Sight
id-00003.desc: The droid has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

id-00001.name: Shockprod
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 lightning damage.

id-00001.name: Circuitry
id-00001.desc: The droid has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal ion or lightning damage.

id-00002.name: Keen Hearing And Sight
id-00002.desc: The probe droid has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

id-00001.name: Blaster Cannon
id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10+2) energy damage.

id-00002.name: Self-Destruct
id-00002.desc: When the probe droid is reduced to half of its hit point maximum, it attempts to self-destruct.\rEach creature within 20 feet of it must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 6d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

id-00001.name: Spellcasting
id-00001.desc: The protocol droid, 000 series is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The droid has 22 tech points. The protocol droid, 000 series has the following spells prepared:\rCantrips (At will): assess the situation, electroshock, venomous strike\r1st level (22 slots): poison dart, spot the weakness, toxin scan, tranquilizer\r2nd level (22 slots): paralyze humanoid, toxin purge, truth serum\r3rd level (22 slots): tactical advantage

id-00001.name: Tortuous Strike
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) kinetic damage and, if the target is a creature, the creature is shocked until the end of its next turn.

id-00001.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
id-00001.desc: If the droid fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The droid makes two blaster rifle attacks.

id-00002.name: Blaster Rifle
id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8+1) energy damage.

rathtar.name: Rathtar
rathtar.damageresistances: poison, energy, ion, kinetic from nonmagical weapons

id-00001.name: Unhindered Movement
id-00001.desc: The rathar's movement speed is not reduced while moving with a grappled creature.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The rathtar can use its Consume and then make four flailing arm attacks. Alternatively, the rathtar can make four attacks. two with its grasping tentacles and then two with its bite.

id-00002.name: Bite
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) kinetic damage, and the target is swallowed if it is a Medium or smaller creature. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, has total cover against attacks other effects outside the rathtar, and takes 14 (4d6) acid damage at the start of each of the rathtar's turns.\rThe rathtar's gullet can hold only one Large creature or up to two Medium or smaller creatures inside it at a time. If the rathtar takes 20 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the rathtar must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the rathtar. If the rathtar dies, the swallowed creatures are no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

id-00003.name: Flailing Arms
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) kinetic damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16) if it is Medium or smaller.\rUntil the grapple ends, the rathar can't use this arm on another target. The rathtar has ten arms and can have up to four creatures grappled at a time.

id-00004.name: Consume
id-00004.desc: The rathtar moves up to its speed. While doing so, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. The first time the rathar enters a creature's space, the rathtar can make bite attack against that creature. If the attack misses, the creature is pushed 5 feet back or to the side of the rathtar, takes 9 (2d8) kinetic damage, and is knocked prone.

id-00005.name: Grasping Tentacles
id-00005.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) kinetic damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must also make a DC 17 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is pulled into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the rathtar. The rathtar has two grasping tentacles.

id-00001.name: Spider Climb
id-00001.desc: The rathtar can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

id-00002.name: Grasping Arms
id-00002.desc: The rathtar can have up to eight arms at a time. Each arm can be attacked (AC 20; 10 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage). Destroying an arm deals no damage to the rathtar, which can extrude a replacement arm on its next turn. An arm can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a DC 15 Strength check against it.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The rathtar makes four flailing arm attacks, uses Reel, and makes one attack with its bite.

id-00002.name: Flailing Arms
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) kinetic damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15) if it is Medium or smaller.\rUntil the grapple ends, the rathar can't use this arm on another target. The rathtar has eight arms and can have up to four creatures grappled at a time.

id-00003.name: Bite
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) kinetic damage.

id-00004.name: Reel
id-00004.desc: The rathtar pulls each creature grapples by it up to 15 feet straight toward it.

id-00001.name: Bite
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, Reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 (1d3-1) kinetic damage, and the target must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 14). On a success, the creature is unaffected by the venom. On a failure, the creature loses 1d6 Strength, then must attempt another save 1 minute (10 rounds) later. If the second save fails, the creature loses an additional 1d6 Strength. If this reduces the creature's Strength to 0 or lower, it dies.

id-00001.name: Trampling Charge
id-00001.desc: If the Ronto moves at least 20 ft.\rstraight toward a creature and then hits it with a Ram attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the Ronto can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

id-00001.name: Slam
id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) kinetic damage.

id-00002.name: Stomp
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) kinetic damage.

sandoaquamonster.name: Sando Aqua Monster
sandoaquamonster.damageimmunities: cold, lightning, kinetic, ion, energy from nonmagical weapons
sandoaquamonster.senses: blindsight 120 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 22

id-00001.name: Amphibious
id-00001.desc: The monster can breathe air and water.

id-00002.name: Freedom Of Movement
id-00002.desc: The monster ignores difficult terrain, and effects can't reduce its speed. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from being grappled.

id-00003.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
id-00003.desc: If the monster fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

id-00004.name: Gargantan Strength
id-00004.desc: The monster's weapon attacks are considered enhanced.

id-00005.name: Siege Monster
id-00005.desc: The monster does double damage on objects and structures.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The monster uses its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks. one with its bite and two with its claws. It can use its Swallow instead of its bite.

id-00002.name: Bite
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (2d10 + 10) piercing damage. If the target is a creature it is grappled (escape DC 20). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the monster can't bite another target.

id-00003.name: Claw
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d6 + 10) slashing damage.

id-00004.name: Tail
id-00004.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage.

id-00005.name: Frightful Presence
id-00005.desc: Each creature of the monster's choice within 120 feet of the monster and aware of it must succeed on a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each turn, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effects ends for it, the creature is immune to the monster's Frightful Presence for 24 hours.

id-00006.name: Water Torrent (Recharge 5-6)
id-00006.desc: the monster exhales a torrent of water in a 120 foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw, taking 42 (12d6) kinetic damage and 42 (12d6) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

id-00007.name: Swallow
id-00007.desc: The monster makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target takes the bite's damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the monster, and it takes 42 (12d6) acid damage at the start of each of the monster's turns.\rIf the monster takes 50 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the monster must succeed on a DC 25 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the monster. If the monster dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 30 feet of movement, exiting prone.

id-00001.name: Options
id-00001.desc: The monster can take 3 legendary actions, choosing form the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The monster regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

id-00002.name: Detect
id-00002.desc: The monster makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

id-00003.name: Tail Attack
id-00003.desc: The monster makes a tail attack.

id-00004.name: Whirlpool (Costs 2 Actions)
id-00004.desc: The monster creates a whirlpool in the water at a point within 30 ft. that it can see. The whirlwind is a 10-foot-radius, 30-foot-deep cylinder centered on that point. On subsequent turns, the monster can use the Whirlpool legendary action to maintain and move the whirlpool up to 30 feet in any direction along the surface of the water. The whirlpool sucks up any medium or smaller objects that aren't secured to anything and that aren't worn or carried by anyone.\rA creature must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw the first time on a turn that it enters the whirlpool or that the whirlpool enters its space, including when the whirlpool first appears. A creature takes 6d8 kinetic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. In addition, a Large or smaller creature that fails the save must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or become restrained in the whirlpool until the power ends. When a creature starts its turn restrained by the whirlpool, the creature is pulled 5 feet deeper inside it, unless the creature is at the bottom. A restrained creature moves with the whirlpool and is submerged when the effect ends, unless the creature has some means to stay afloat.\rA restrained creature can use an action to make a DC 21 Strength or Dexterity check. If successful, the creature is no longer restrained by the whirlpool and is hurled 3d6x10 feet away from it in a random direction.\rThe whirlpool ends at the beginning of the monster's turn unless the monster used the Whirlpool legendary action to maintain the whirlpool.

sarlacc_adult.name: Sarlacc, Adult
sarlacc_adult.damageresistances: sonic, energy, ion, kinetic from nonmagical weapons
sarlacc_adult.conditionimmunities: exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone

id-00001.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
id-00001.desc: If the Sarlacc fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

id-00002.name: Gargantuan Strength
id-00002.desc: The sarlacc's weapon attacks are considered enhanced.

id-00003.name: Burried
id-00003.desc: The sarlacc is resistant to damage from sources beyond 60 feet and immune to damage from sources beyond 120 feet.

id-00004.name: Grasping Tentacles
id-00004.desc: The sarlacc can have up to eight tentacles at a time. Each tentacle can be attacked (AC 18; 40 hit points; immunity to psychic damage). A tentacle can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a DC 22 Strength check against it.\rDestroying a tentacle in either way deals no damage to the sarlacc, which can extrude a replacement tentacle on its next turn, but it causes the sarlacc to spend a legendary action for no effect. If the sarlacc has no legendary actions remaining this turn to spend, the sarlacc regains one fewer spent legendary actions at the start of its next turn than it would otherwise regain. The sarlacc can be forced to spend no more than two legendary actions in this way.

id-00001.name: Multiattack
id-00001.desc: The sarlacc makes three tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with one use of Bite.

id-00002.name: Tentacle
id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 60 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (4d8 + 8) kinetic damage. The target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. The sarlacc has eight tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

id-00003.name: Bite
id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 30 (4d10 + 8) Kinetic damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the sarlacc can't bite another target.

id-00004.name: Swallow
id-00004.desc: The sarlacc makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target takes the bite's damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the sarlacc, and it takes 35 (10d6) psychic damage at the start of each of the sarlacc's turns. A creature reduced to zero hit points this way stops taking the psychic damage and becomes stable.\rIf the sarlacc takes 40 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the sarlacc must succeed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the sarlacc. If the sarlacc dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 10 feet of movement, exiting prone.

id-00005.name: Pheromones (Recharge 5-6)
id-00005.desc: The sarlacc releases pheromones in a 300 ft. radius. Each creature in that area must make a DC 22 Constitution saving throw.
